patterns: paano po mag bayad online for lab manual po?
Tanong ko pang po sana kung pwde po ba magbayad online for our mid term exam?
Mag ask lang po sa details ng online payment po ng tuition?
Pwede po via bank acct and online magbayad ng tuition?
pwede po ba mag bayad via BANK?
Mag-ask sana ako about sa bank account at school fees ko po
saan po esent ang proof of payment po namin thru ML po?
Kung ipapadala Lang Yung pera Name ng receiver po
If ever di po ako makapunta ng school po to pay for midterm payment, saan ko po sya pwedeng ipapadala? And how po?
pwede mka ask NG account no. Nyo. Para ilagay ko sa pera Padala NG ML
paano mag bayad through bank?
can i ask po pano poba magbayad sa palawan po?
Pwedi po ako makahingi bank account sa school po?
pwede po through cebuana po ang payment?
ask lang po kung pwede ba magbank transfer sa account ninyo sa AUB para po sa midterm  payment
How can I pay  while Im outside the country?
responses: NDKC's supported online payment method are thru: Banks (AUB, BDO, ChinaBank), Palawan Padala, RD Pawnshops, Cebuana Padala, and ML Kwarta Padala

patterns: Naa moy online enrollment?
Is the online enrollment already open?
online mode lang po tlaga enrollment? Or we can go directly sa school?
is it possible to pay my downpayment walk in even if i enrolled online?
when is the online enrollment for college
ask lng po aq if open mu for enrollment
responses: NDKC's College Enrollment will start at:       and end at:

patterns: Nagpa enroll nako online po last wednesday pero wala pa akong sched po
pwede po ba mag enroll this second sem kahit may remaining balance pa last sem?
When po kayo mag email po? Para maka pag pay napo ako thru ML
responses: If you have any concerns with your online enrollment please contact the Business Office with this number 09xxxxxxxx.

patterns: Regarding po sana sa payment ng tuition through ML kwarta padala?
sa akong payment sa final wala man nag reply po if na recieve naba
Asa pwede maka ask po
nagreflect na po payment ko thru palawan?
pa confirm sana ng payment ko po na gisend sa email sa finance
ok na po ba yung payment ko?
may i have the copy of my receipt po?
we already sent the money thru palawan express and i already emailed the form to the gmail address po
I did an online enrollment last 12 of January and I  haven't receive any confirmation up to now.
I would like to ask any update for my online enrollment that I've made through this procedures.
Nag enroll po ako online pero wala pa po akong natatanggap na email
Ask ko lang po if meron na po bang confirmation sa enrollment ko po
nakapadala na kasi kami paano raw kami ma notified in what way po through message po ba? Or text? Kasi naka hulog napo kami.
responses: Sorry for the inconvenience. We will consult with the business office regarding with that issue. We will get back to you as soon as we can. Thank you.

patterns: dili ba ma deduct tung sobra namo niaging term po? karong finals?
Pwede mag issue ug check po pang bayad tuition?
responses: It would be better if a school business office personnel will address this issue. Please contact the following number 09xxxxxxxx

patterns: I’d like to ask if supported ba ang GCash payment for matriculation

Nagsend po ako ng payment for my tuition via Gcash.
responses: The school's payment system currently supports Gcash with this number: 09xxxxxxxxx
